 25471                                  
 25472                                  	; Main entry for device open and close. AL contains the function 
 25473                                  	; requested. Subtlety: if Sharing is NOT loaded then we do NOT issue 
 25474                                  	; open/close to block devices. This allows networks to function but 
 25475                                  	; does NOT hang up with bogus change-line code.

 25493                                  	; We are about to call device open/close on a block driver. If no 
 25494                                  	; sharing then just short circuit to done.

 25501                                  	; MSDOS 3.3 (& MSDOS 6.0)

 25686                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25687                                  ;
 25688                                  ; Procedure Name : SETREAD, SETWRITE
 25689                                  ;
 25690                                  ; Inputs:
 25691                                  ;	DS:BX = Transfer Address
 25692                                  ;	CX = Record Count
 25693                                  ;	DX = Starting Record
 25694                                  ;	AH = Media Byte
 25695                                  ;	AL = Unit Code
 25696                                  ; Function:

 25698                                  ; Output:

 25771                                  ; 30/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 25772                                  ; DOSCODE:86A8h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 25773                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 25774                                  ; DOSCODE:866Dh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 25775                                  
 25776                                  ;Break	<RW_SC -- Read Write Secondary Cache>
 25777                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25778                                  ;
 25779                                  ; Procedure Name : RW_SC
 25780                                  ;
 25781                                  ; Inputs:
 25782                                  ;	 [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= secondary cache count
 25783                                  ;	 [SC_STATUS]= SC validity status
 25784                                  ;	 [SEQ_SECTOR]= last sector read
 25785                                  ; Function:
 25786                                  ;	Read from or write through secondary cache
 25787                                  ; Output:
 25788                                  ;	ES:BX Points to DEVCALL
 25789                                  ;	carry clear, I/O is not done
 25790                                  ;		     [SC_FLAG]=1 if continuos sectors will be read
 25791                                  ;	carry set, I/O is done
 25792                                  ;
 25793                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 25794                                  
 25795                                  RW_SC:
 25796                                  	; SS override for all variables used.
 25797                                  	
 25798 000047D0 36833E[7700]00          	CMP	word [ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT],0  ;AN000;LB. secondary cache exists?
 25799 000047D6 7421                    	JZ	short scexit4		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 25800 000047D8 36833E[6C03]01          	CMP	word [ss:CALLSCNT],1	    ;AN000;LB. sector count = 1 (buffer I/O)
 25801 000047DE 7519                    	JNZ	short scexit4 		    ;AN000;LB. no, do nothing
 25802 000047E0 51                      	PUSH	CX			    ;AN000;LB.
 25803 000047E1 52                      	PUSH	DX			    ;AN000;LB. yes
 25804 000047E2 1E                      	PUSH	DS			    ;AN000;LB. save registers
 25805 000047E3 56                      	PUSH	SI			    ;AN000;LB.
 25806 000047E4 06                      	PUSH	ES			    ;AN000;LB.
 25807 000047E5 57                      	PUSH	DI			    ;AN000;LB.
 25808                                  
 25809 000047E6 368B16[6E03]            	MOV	DX,[ss:CALLSSEC]	    ;AN000;LB. starting sector
 25810 000047EB 36803E[5C03]04          	CMP	BYTE [ss:DEVCALL_REQFUNC],DEVRD ;AN000;LB. read ?
 25811 000047F1 7408                    	JZ	short doread		    ;AN000;LB. yes
 25812 000047F3 E8C400                  	CALL	INVALIDATE_SC		    ;AN000;LB. invalidate SC
 25813 000047F6 E98E00                  	JMP	scexit2 		    ;AN000;LB. back to normal
 25814                                  scexit4:				    ;AN000;
 25815 000047F9 F8                      	CLC				    ;AN000;LB. I/O not done yet
 25816 000047FA C3                      	retn				    ;AN000;LB.
 25817                                  doread: 				    ;AN000;
 25818 000047FB E82601                  	CALL	SC2BUF			    ;AN000;LB. check if in SC
 25819 000047FE 720A                    	JC	short readSC		    ;AN000;LB.

 25872                                  ;Break	<IN_SC -- check if in secondary cache>

 25874                                  ;
 25875                                  ; Procedure Name : IN_SC
 25876                                  ;
 25877                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_DRIVE]= requesting drive
 25878                                  ;	   [CURSC_DRIVE]= current SC drive
 25879                                  ;	   [CURSC_SECTOR]= starting scetor # of SC
 25880                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_COUNT]= SC count
 25881                                  ;	   [HIGH_SECTOR]:DX= sector number
 25882                                  ; Function:
 25883                                  ;	Check if the sector is in secondary cache
 25884                                  ; Output:
 25885                                  ;	carry clear, in SC
 25886                                  ;	   CX= the index in the secondary cache
 25887                                  ;	carry set, not in SC
 25888                                  ;

 25898 0000489E 89D1                    	MOV	CX,DX			    ;AN000;;LB. secondary starting sector

 25903 000048AF 363B0E[7700]            	CMP	CX,[ss:SC_CACHE_COUNT]	    ;AN000;;LB. greater than SC count
 25904 000048B4 7302                    	JAE	short outrange2		    ;AN000;;LB. yes

 25911

 25914                                  inexit: 				    ;AN000;;LB.

 26015                                  ;Break	<SC2BUF- move data from SC to buffer>

 26017                                  ;
 26018                                  ; Procedure Name : SC2BUF
 26019                                  ;
 26020                                  ; Inputs:  [SC_STATUS] = SC validity status
 26021                                  ;	   [SC_SECTOR_SIZE] = request sector size
 26022                                  ;	   [SC_CACHE_PTR] = pointer to SC
 26023                                  ; Function:
 26024                                  ;	   Move data from SC to buffer

 26026                                  ;	   carry clear, in SC  and data is moved

 26035 0000492C D3E0                    	SHL	AX,CL			    ;AN000;LB. in the secondary cache
 26036 0000492E 368506[B50D]            	TEST	[ss:SC_STATUS],AX	    ;AN000;LB.
 26037 00004933 7435                    	JZ	short noSC		    ;AN000;LB. invalid

 26071                                  ;	TITLE	MKNODE - Node maker
 26072                                  ;	NAME	MKNODE
 26073                                  
 26074                                  ;**	MKNODE.ASM
 26075                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26076                                  ;	Low level routines for making a new local file system node
 26077                                  ;	and filling in an SFT from a directory entry
 26078                                  ;
 26079                                  ;	BUILDDIR
 26080                                  ;	SETDOTENT
 26081                                  ;	MakeNode
 26082                                  ;	NEWENTRY
 26083                                  ;	FREEENT
 26084                                  ;	NEWDIR
 26085                                  ;	DOOPEN
 26086                                  ;	RENAME_MAKE
 26087                                  ;	CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 26088                                  ;
 26089                                  ;	Revision history:
 26090                                  ;
 26091                                  ;	 AN000	version 4.0  Jan. 1988
 26092                                  ;	 A004	PTM 3680  --- Make SFT NAME field offset same as 3.30
 26093                                  
 26094                                  ;Break   <BUILDDIR,NEWDIR -- ALLOCATE DIRECTORIES>
 26095                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26096                                  ;
 26097                                  ; Procedure Name : BUILDDIR,NEWDIR
 26098                                  ;
 26099                                  ; Inputs:
 26100                                  ;       ES:BP Points to DPB
 26101                                  ;       [THISSFT] Set if using NEWDIR entry point
 26102                                  ;               (used by ALLOCATE)
 26103                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 26104                                  ;               entries
 26105                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 26106                                  ; Function:
 26107                                  ;       Grow directory if no free entries and not root
 26108                                  ; Outputs:
 26109                                  ;       CARRY SET IF FAILURE
 26110                                  ;       ELSE
 26111                                  ;          AX entry number of new entry
 26112                                  ;          If a new dir [DIRSTART],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM],[DIRSEC] set
 26113                                  ;               AX = first entry of new dir
 26114                                  ;       GETENT should be called to set [LASTENT]
 26115                                  ;
 26116                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26117                                  
 26118                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26119                                  ; DOSCODE:8845h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26120                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26121                                  ; DOSCODE:880Ah (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26122                                  
 26123                                  BUILDDIR:
 26124                                  	; 29/07/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
 26125                                  	; IBMDOS.COM (MSDOS 3.3, 1987) - Offset 4E66h
 26126                                  
 26127 0000496C A1[D805]                        MOV     AX,[ENTFREE]
 26128 0000496F 83F8FF                          CMP     AX,-1
 26129 00004972 7402                            JZ	short CHECK_IF_ROOT
 26130 00004974 F8                              CLC
 26131 00004975 C3                              retn
 26132                                  
 26133                                  CHECK_IF_ROOT:
 26134 00004976 833E[C205]00                    CMP     word [DIRSTART],0
 26135 0000497B 7502                            JNZ	short NEWDIR
 26136 0000497D F9                              STC
 26137                                  builddir_retn:
 26138 0000497E C3                              retn				; Can't grow root
 26139                                  
 26140                                  	;entry   NEWDIR
 26141                                  NEWDIR:        
 26142 0000497F 8B1E[C205]              	MOV     BX,[DIRSTART]
 26143 00004983 09DB                            OR      BX,BX
 26144 00004985 7405                            JZ	short NULLDIR
 26145 00004987 E84006                  	call	GETEOF
 26146 0000498A 72F2                            jc	short builddir_retn	; Screw up
 26147                                  NULLDIR:
 26148 0000498C B90100                          MOV     CX,1
 26149 0000498F E85105                  	call	ALLOCATE
 26150 00004992 72EA                            jc	short  builddir_retn
 26151 00004994 8B16[C205]                      MOV     DX,[DIRSTART]
 26152 00004998 09D2                            OR      DX,DX
 26153 0000499A 750D                            JNZ	short ADDINGDIR
 26154 0000499C E8BAF5                  	call	SETDIRSRCH
 26155 0000499F 72DD                            jc	short  builddir_retn
 26156 000049A1 C706[4803]FFFF                  MOV     word [LASTENT],-1
 26157 000049A7 EB2B                            JMP     SHORT GOTDIRREC
 26158                                  ADDINGDIR:
 26159 000049A9 53                              PUSH    BX
 26160 000049AA 8B1E[BC05]                      MOV     BX,[CLUSNUM]
 26161 000049AE E84B0C                          call	IsEOF
 26162 000049B1 5B                              POP     BX
 26163 000049B2 7219                            JB	short NOTFIRSTGROW
 26164                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 26165 000049B4 891E[BC05]                      MOV     [CLUSNUM],BX
 26166 000049B8 51                              PUSH    CX
 26167 000049B9 50                              PUSH    AX
 26168 000049BA 55                              PUSH    BP
 26169 000049BB B401                            MOV     AH,1			; CLUSNUM update
 26170                                  	; 15/12/2022
 26171 000049BD 268A5600                	mov	dl,[ES:BP] ; 09/09/2018
 26172                                          ; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26173                                  	;;mov	dl,[es:bp+0]
 26174                                  	;MOV	DL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; drive #
 26175 000049C1 8B0E[C205]                      MOV     CX,[DIRSTART]		; first cluster #
 26176 000049C5 89DD                            MOV     BP,BX 			; CLUSNUM
 26177 000049C7 E895DD                  	call	FastOpen_Update
 26178 000049CA 5D                              POP     BP
 26179 000049CB 58                              POP     AX
 26180 000049CC 59                              POP     CX
 26181                                  
 26182                                  ;;;; 10/17/86 update CLUSNUM in the fastopen cache
 26183                                  NOTFIRSTGROW:
 26184 000049CD 89DA                            MOV     DX,BX
 26185 000049CF 30DB                            XOR     BL,BL
 26186 000049D1 E8E304                  	call	FIGREC
 26187                                  GOTDIRREC:
 26188                                  	;mov	cl,[es:bp+4]
 26189 000049D4 268A4E04                        MOV     CL,[ES:BP+DPB.CLUSTER_MASK]
 26190 000049D8 FEC1                            INC     CL
 26191 000049DA 30ED                            XOR     CH,CH
 26192                                  ZERODIR:
 26193 000049DC 51                              PUSH    CX
 26194                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 26195 000049DD C606[4B03]18                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 26196 000049E2 B0FF                            MOV     AL,0FFH
 26197 000049E4 E84E10                          call	GETBUFFR
 26198 000049E7 7302                            JNC	short GET_SSIZE
 26199 000049E9 59                              POP     CX
 26200 000049EA C3                              retn
 26201                                  
 26202                                  GET_SSIZE:
 26203                                  	;mov	cx,[es:bp+2]
 26204 000049EB 268B4E02                        MOV     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.SECTOR_SIZE]
 26205 000049EF 06                              PUSH    ES
 26206 000049F0 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 26207                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],4
 26208 000049F4 26804D0504                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_isDIR
 26209 000049F9 57                              PUSH    DI
 26210                                  	;;add	di,16	; MSDOS 3.3
 26211                                  	;add	di,20	; MSDOS 6.0	
 26212 000049FA 83C714                          ADD     DI,BUFINSIZ
 26213 000049FD 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26214 000049FF D1E9                            SHR     CX,1
 26215 00004A01 F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 26216 00004A03 7301                            JNC	short EVENZ
 26217 00004A05 AA                              STOSB
 26218                                  EVENZ:
 26219 00004A06 5F                              POP     DI
 26220                                  
 26221                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26222 00004A07 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 26223                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 26224 00004A0C 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty7		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 26225 00004A0E E82A12                          call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB. 				  ;AN000;
 26226                                          
 26227                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 26228 00004A11 26804D0540              	OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 26229                                  yesdirty7:
 26230 00004A16 07                              POP	ES
 26231 00004A17 59                              POP	CX
 26232                                  
 26233                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26234                                  
 26235                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 26236                                  	;INC	DX
 26237                                  
 26238                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26239 00004A18 83C201                  	add	dx,1
 26240 00004A1B 8316[0706]00            	adc	word [HIGH_SECTOR],0
 26241                                  
 26242 00004A20 E2BA                            LOOP    ZERODIR
 26243                                  
 26244 00004A22 A1[4803]                        MOV     AX,[LASTENT]
 26245 00004A25 40                              INC     AX
 26246 00004A26 F8                              CLC
 26247 00004A27 C3                              retn
 26248                                  
 26249                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26250                                  ;
 26251                                  ; Procedure Name : SETDOTENT
 26252                                  ;
 26253                                  ; set up a . or .. directory entry for a directory.
 26254                                  ;
 26255                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI point to the beginning of a directory entry.
 26256                                  ;               AX contains ". " or ".."
 26257                                  ;               DX contains first cluster of entry
 26258                                  ;
 26259                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26260                                  
 26261                                  SETDOTENT:
 26262                                  ;	Fill in name field
 26263 00004A28 AB                              STOSW
 26264 00004A29 B90400                          MOV     CX,4
 26265 00004A2C B82020                          MOV     AX,"  " ; 2020h
 26266 00004A2F F3AB                            REP     STOSW
 26267 00004A31 AA                              STOSB
 26268                                  
 26269                                  ;	Set up attribute
 26270                                  	;mov	al, 10h
 26271 00004A32 B010                            MOV     AL,attr_directory
 26272 00004A34 AA                              STOSB
 26273                                  
 26274                                  ;	Initialize time and date of creation
 26275 00004A35 83C70A                          ADD     DI,10
 26276 00004A38 8B36[9E05]                      MOV     SI,[THISSFT]
 26277                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Dh]
 26278 00004A3C 8B440D                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_time]
 26279 00004A3F AB                              STOSW
 26280                                  	;mov	ax,[si+0Fh]
 26281 00004A40 8B440F                          MOV     AX,[SI+SF_ENTRY.sf_date]
 26282 00004A43 AB                      	STOSW
 26283                                  
 26284                                  ;	Set up first cluster field
 26285 00004A44 89D0                            MOV     AX,DX
 26286 00004A46 AB                              STOSW
 26287                                  
 26288                                  ;	0 file size
 26289 00004A47 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26290 00004A49 AB                              STOSW
 26291 00004A4A AB                              STOSW
 26292 00004A4B C3                              retn
 26293                                  
 26294                                  ;Break   <MAKENODE -- CREATE A NEW NODE>
 26295                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26296                                  ;
 26297                                  ; Procedure Name : MakeNode
 26298                                  ;
 26299                                  ; Inputs:
 26300                                  ;       AL - attribute to create
 26301                                  ;       AH = 0 if it is ok to truncate a file already by this name
 26302                                  ;	AH != 0 if truncation not allowed (prexisting file is an error)
 26303                                  ;               (AH ignored on dirs and devices)
 26304                                  ;
 26305                                  ;        NOTE: When making a DIR or volume ID, AH need not be set since
 26306                                  ;               a name already existant is ALWAYS an error in these cases.
 26307                                  ;
 26308                                  ;       [WFP_START] Points to WFP string ("d:/" must be first 3 chars, NUL
 26309                                  ;               terminated)
 26310                                  ;       [CURR_DIR_END] Points to end of Current dir part of string
 26311                                  ;               ( = -1 if current dir not involved, else
 26312                                  ;                Points to first char after last "/" of current dir part)
 26313                                  ;       [THISCDS] Points to CDS being used
 26314                                  ;       [THISSFT] Points to an empty SFT. EXCEPT sf_mode filled in.
 26315                                  ; Function:
 26316                                  ;       Make a new node
 26317                                  ; Outputs:
 26318                                  ;       Sets EXTERR_LOCUS = errLOC_Disk or errLOC_Unk via GetPathNoset
 26319                                  ;       CARRY SET IF ERROR
 26320                                  ;          AX = 1 A node by this name exists and is a directory
 26321                                  ;          AX = 2 A new node could not be created
 26322                                  ;          AX = 3 A node by this name exists and is a disk file
 26323                                  ;               (AH was NZ on input)
 26324                                  ;          AX = 4 Bad Path
 26325                                  ;               SI return from GetPath maintained
 26326                                  ;          AX = 5 Attribute mismatch
 26327                                  ;          AX = 6 Sharing Violation
 26328                                  ;               (INT 24 generated ALWAYS since create is always compat mode
 26329                                  ;          AX = 7 file not found for Extended Open (not exists and fails)
 26330                                  ;       ELSE
 26331                                  ;          AX = 0 Disk Node
 26332                                  ;          AX = 3 Device Node (error in some cases)
 26333                                  ;          [DIRSTART],[DIRSEC],[CLUSFAC],[CLUSNUM] set to directory
 26334                                  ;               containing new node.
 26335                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:BX Points to entry
 26336                                  ;          [CURBUF+2]:SI Points to entry.dir_first
 26337                                  ;          [THISSFT] is filled in
 26338                                  ;               sf_mode = unchanged.
 26339                                  ;          Attribute byte in entry is input AL
 26340                                  ; DS preserved, others destroyed
 26341                                  ;
 26342                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26343                                  
 26344                                  ; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26345                                  ; DOSCODE:8925h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26346                                  
 26347                                  ; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26348                                  ; DOSCODE:88EAh (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26349                                  
 26350                                  MakeNode:
 26351                                  	;mov	word [CREATING],0E5FFh
 26352 00004A4C C706[7E05]FFE5          	MOV	WORD [CREATING],DIRFREE*256 + 0FFh ; Creating, not DEL *.*
 26353 00004A52 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save AH value
 26354 00004A53 C606[4C03]00            	MOV	byte [NoSetDir],0
 26355 00004A58 A2[6D05]                	MOV	[SATTRIB],AL
 26356 00004A5B E861F5                  	call	GetPathNoSet
 26357 00004A5E 88CA                            MOV     DL,CL           ; Save CL info
 26358 00004A60 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; Device ID to CH
 26359 00004A62 58                              POP     AX              ; Get back AH
 26360 00004A63 732E                            JNC	short make_exists ; File existed
 26361 00004A65 7505                            JNZ	short make_err_4 ; Path bad
 26362 00004A67 80FA80                          CMP     DL,80h          ; Check "CL" return from GETPATH
 26363 00004A6A 7406                            JZ	short make_type	; Name simply not found, and no metas
 26364                                  make_err_4:
 26365 00004A6C B004                            MOV     AL,4            ; case 1 bad path
 26366                                  make_err_ret:
 26367 00004A6E 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 26368 00004A70 F9                              STC
 26369                                  ;make_retn:	; 22/11/2022
 26370 00004A71 C3                              retn
 26371                                  
 26372                                          ;entry	RENAME_MAKE     ; Used by DOS_RENAME to "copy" a node
 26373                                  RENAME_MAKE:
 26374                                  make_type:
 26375                                  ;Extended Open hooks
 26376                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26377                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_ON,EXT_OPEN_ON	;FT. from extended open		;AN000;
 26378 00004A72 F606[F605]01            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_OPEN_ON ; 1
 26379 00004A77 7411                    	JZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 26380 00004A79 800E[F605]04            	OR	byte [EXTOPEN_ON],EXT_FILE_NOT_EXISTS ; 4
 26381                                  					;FT. set for extended open ;AN000;
 26382                                  	;TESTB	EXTOPEN_FLAG,0F0H	;FT. not exists and fails	;AN000;
 26383 00004A7E F606[F405]F0            	test	byte [EXTOPEN_FLAG],0F0h
 26384 00004A83 7505                    	JNZ	short make_type2	;FT. no				;AN000;
 26385 00004A85 F9                      	STC				;FT. set carry			;AN000;
 26386 00004A86 B80700                  	MOV    AX,7			;FT. file not found		;AN000;
 26387                                  	; 22/11/2022
 26388                                  make_retn:
 26389                                  	;return
 26390 00004A89 C3                      	retn				;FT.				;AN000;
 26391                                  
 26392                                  ;	Extended Open hooks
 26393                                  
 26394                                  make_type2:
 26395 00004A8A C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 26396 00004A8E 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX           ; nothing exists Disk Node
 26397 00004A90 F9                              STC                     ; Not found
 26398 00004A91 EB5A                            JMP     short make_new
 26399                                  
 26400                                  ; The node exists. It may be either a device, directory or file:
 26401                                  ;   Zero set => directory
 26402                                  ;   High bit of CH on => device
 26403                                  ;   else => file
 26404                                  
 26405                                  make_exists:
 26406 00004A93 7448                            JZ	short make_exists_dir
 26407 00004A95 B003                            MOV     AL,3            ; file exists type 3  (error or device node)
 26408                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],18h
 26409 00004A97 F606[6B05]18            	TEST	byte [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id+attr_directory
 26410 00004A9C 753B                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5
 26411                                  				; Cannot already exist as Disk or Device Node
 26412                                                                  ;       if making DIR or Volume ID
 26413 00004A9E 08ED                            OR      CH,CH
 26414 00004AA0 781A                            JS	short make_share ; No further checks on attributes if device
 26415 00004AA2 08E4                            OR      AH,AH
 26416 00004AA4 75C8                            JNZ	short make_err_ret ; truncating NOT OK (AL = 3)
 26417 00004AA6 51                              PUSH    CX              ; Save device ID
 26418 00004AA7 8E06[E405]                      MOV     ES,[CURBUF+2]
 26419                                  	;mov	ch,[es:bx+0Bh]
 26420 00004AAB 268A6F0B                        MOV     CH,[ES:BX+dir_entry.dir_attr] ; Get file attributes
 26421                                  	;test	ch,1
 26422 00004AAF F6C501                  	test	CH,attr_read_only
 26423 00004AB2 7524                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5P ; Cannot create on read only files
 26424 00004AB4 E8B8F7                  	call	MatchAttributes
 26425 00004AB7 59                              POP     CX              ; Devid back in CH
 26426 00004AB8 751F                            JNZ	short make_err_ret_5 ; Attributes not ok
 26427 00004ABA 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL           ; AL = 0, Disk Node
 26428                                  make_share:
 26429 00004ABC 30E4                            XOR     AH,AH
 26430 00004ABE 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save Disk or Device node
 26431 00004ABF 51                              PUSH    CX              ; Save Device ID
 26432 00004AC0 88EC                            MOV     AH,CH           ; Device ID to AH
 26433 00004AC2 E84601                          CALL    DOOPEN          ; Fill in SFT for share check
 26434 00004AC5 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 26435 00004AC9 56                      	push	si
 26436 00004ACA 53                      	push	bx		; Save CURBUF pointers
 26437 00004ACB E89629                  	call	ShareEnter
 26438 00004ACE 735A                            jnc	short MakeEndShare
 26439                                  
 26440                                  ; User failed request.
 26441 00004AD0 5B                      	pop	bx
 26442 00004AD1 5E                      	pop	si
 26443 00004AD2 59                      	pop	cx
 26444 00004AD3 58                      	pop	ax
 26445                                  
 26446                                  Make_Share_ret:
 26447 00004AD4 B006                            MOV     AL,6
 26448 00004AD6 EB96                            JMP	short make_err_ret
 26449                                  
 26450                                  make_err_ret_5P:
 26451 00004AD8 59                              POP     CX              ; Get back device ID
 26452                                  make_err_ret_5:
 26453 00004AD9 B005                            MOV     AL,5            ; Attribute mismatch
 26454                                          ; 22/11/2022
 26455 00004ADB EB91                    	JMP     short make_err_ret
 26456                                  
 26457                                  make_exists_dir:
 26458 00004ADD B001                            MOV     AL,1            ; exists as directory, always an error
 26459                                  	; 22/11/2022
 26460 00004ADF EB8D                    	JMP     short make_err_ret
 26461                                  
 26462                                  make_save:
 26463 00004AE1 50                              PUSH    AX              ; Save whether Disk or File
 26464 00004AE2 89C8                            MOV     AX,CX           ; Device ID to AH
 26465 00004AE4 E87400                          CALL    NEWENTRY
 26466 00004AE7 58                              POP     AX              ; 0 if Disk, 3 if File
 26467 00004AE8 739F                            jnc	short make_retn
 26468 00004AEA B002                            MOV     AL,2            ; create failed case 2
 26469                                  make_save_retn:
 26470 00004AEC C3                              retn
 26471                                  
 26472                                  make_new:
 26473 00004AED E8F1FF                          call    make_save
 26474 00004AF0 72FA                            jc	short make_save_retn	; case 2 fail
 26475                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],10h
 26476 00004AF2 F606[6B05]10            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_directory
 26477 00004AF7 75F3                            jnz	short make_save_retn	; Don't "open" directories,
 26478                                  					; so don't tell the sharer about them
 26479 00004AF9 50                      	push	ax
 26480 00004AFA 53                      	push	bx
 26481 00004AFB 56                      	push	si		
 26482 00004AFC E86529                          call	ShareEnter
 26483 00004AFF 5E                      	pop	si
 26484 00004B00 5B                      	pop	bx
 26485 00004B01 58                      	pop	ax
 26486 00004B02 73E8                    	jnc	short make_save_retn
 26487                                  
 26488                                  ; We get here by having the user FAIL a share problem. Typically a failure of
 26489                                  ; this nature is an out-of-space or an internal error. We clean up as best as
 26490                                  ; possible: delete the newly created directory entry and return share_error.
 26491                                  
 26492 00004B04 50                              PUSH    AX
 26493 00004B05 C43E[E205]                      LES     DI,[CURBUF]
 26494                                  	;mov	byte [es:bx],0E5h
 26495 00004B09 26C607E5                	MOV	BYTE [ES:BX],DIRFREE	; nuke newly created entry.
 26496                                  	
 26497                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26498                                  	;test	byte [es:di+5],40h
 26499 00004B0D 26F6450540              	TEST	byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty  
 26500                                  					;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 26501 00004B12 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty8		;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 26502                                  	; 22/11/2022
 26503 00004B14 E82411                  	call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT		;LB.				  ;AN000;
 26504                                  	;or	byte [es:di+5],40h
 26505 00004B17 26804D0540                      OR      byte [ES:DI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty ; flag buffer as dirty
 26506                                  yesdirty8:
 26507 00004B1C C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 26508                                  	; 15/12/2022
 26509 00004B20 268A4600                        mov	al,[ES:BP]
 26510                                  	; 22/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 26511                                  	;;mov	al,[es:bp+0]
 26512                                  	;MOV	AL,[ES:BP+DPB.DRIVE]	; get drive for flush
 26513 00004B24 E80C10                          call	FLUSHBUF		; write out buffer.
 26514 00004B27 58                              POP     AX
 26515 00004B28 EBAA                            jmp	short Make_Share_ret
 26516                                  
 26517                                  ; We have found an existing file. We have also entered it into the share set.
 26518                                  ; At this point we need to call newentry to correctly address the problem of
 26519                                  ; getting rid of old data (create an existing file) or creating a new
 26520                                  ; directory entry (create a new file). Unfortunately, this operation may
 26521                                  ; result in an INT 24 that the user doesn't return from, thus locking the file
 26522                                  ; irretrievably into the share set. The correct solution is for us to LEAVE
 26523                                  ; the share set now, do the operation and then reassert the share access.
 26524                                  ;
 26525                                  ; We are allowed to do this! There is no window! After all, we are in
 26526                                  ; critDisk here and for someone else to get in, they must enter critDisk also.
 26527                                  
 26528                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26529                                  	; DOSCODE:89C8h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26530                                  
 26531                                  MakeEndShare:
 26532 00004B2A C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]		; grab SFT
 26533 00004B2E 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26534 00004B30 E855C8                  	call	ECritSFT
 26535 00004B33 268705                  	xchg	AX,[ES:DI]
 26536                                  	;XCHG	AX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 26537 00004B36 50                      	push	ax
 26538 00004B37 57                      	push	di
 26539 00004B38 06                      	push	es
 26540 00004B39 9C                              PUSHF
 26541 00004B3A E82229                          call	ShareEnd                ; remove sharing
 26542 00004B3D 9D                              POPF
 26543 00004B3E 07                      	pop	es
 26544 00004B3F 5F                      	pop	di
 26545 00004B40 268F05                          pop	word [ES:DI]	
 26546                                  	;pop	word [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_ref_count]
 26547 00004B43 E85DC8                  	call	LCritSFT
 26548                                  	; 22/11/2022
 26549                                  	; DOSCODE:89E4h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26550 00004B46 5B                      	pop	bx
 26551 00004B47 5E                      	pop	si
 26552 00004B48 59                      	pop	cx
 26553 00004B49 58                      	pop	ax
 26554 00004B4A E894FF                          CALL    make_save
 26555                                  
 26556                                  ; If the user failed, we do not reenter into the sharing set.
 26557                                  
 26558 00004B4D 729D                            jc	short make_save_retn	; bye if error
 26559 00004B4F 50                      	push	ax
 26560 00004B50 53                      	push	bx
 26561 00004B51 56                      	push	si
 26562 00004B52 9C                              PUSHF
 26563 00004B53 E80E29                          call	ShareEnter
 26564 00004B56 9D                              POPF
 26565 00004B57 5E                      	pop	si
 26566 00004B58 5B                      	pop	bx
 26567 00004B59 58                      	pop	ax
 26568                                  
 26569                                  ; If Share_check fails, then we have an internal ERROR!!!!!
 26570                                  
 26571                                  makeendshare_retn:
 26572 00004B5A C3                              retn
 26573                                  
 26574                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26575                                  ;
 26576                                  ; Procedure Name : NEWENTRY
 26577                                  ;
 26578                                  ; Inputs:
 26579                                  ;       [THISSFT] set
 26580                                  ;       [THISDPB] set
 26581                                  ;       [LASTENT] current last valid entry number in directory if no free
 26582                                  ;               entries
 26583                                  ;       [VOLID] set if a volume ID was found during search
 26584                                  ;	Attrib Contains attributes for new file
 26585                                  ;       [DIRSTART] Points to first cluster of dir (0 means root)
 26586                                  ;       CARRY FLAG INDICATES STATUS OF SEARCH FOR FILE
 26587                                  ;               NC means file existed (device)
 26588                                  ;               C  means file did not exist
 26589                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 26590                                  ;       If FILE
 26591                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 26592                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 26593                                  ;       If device
 26594                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 26595                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 26596                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 26597                                  ; Function:
 26598                                  ;       Make a new directory entry
 26599                                  ;       If an old one existed it is truncated first
 26600                                  ; Outputs:
 26601                                  ;       Carry set if error
 26602                                  ;               Can't grow dir, atts didn't match, attempt to make 2nd
 26603                                  ;               vol ID, user FAILed to I 24
 26604                                  ;       else
 26605                                  ;               outputs of DOOPEN
 26606                                  ; DS, BX, SI preserved (meaning on SI BX, not value), others destroyed
 26607                                  ;
 26608                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26609                                  
 26610                                  	; 22/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26611                                  	; DOSCODE:89F9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26612                                  
 26613                                  NEWENTRY:
 26614 00004B5B C42E[8A05]                      LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 26615 00004B5F 7316                            JNC	short EXISTENT	
 26616 00004B61 803E[4A03]00                    CMP     byte [FAILERR],0
 26617 00004B66 F9                              STC
 26618 00004B67 75F1                            jnz	short makeendshare_retn	; User FAILed, node might exist
 26619 00004B69 E800FE                          CALL    BUILDDIR        ; Try to build dir
 26620 00004B6C 72EC                            jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 26621 00004B6E E8BAF3                          call	GETENT          ; Point at that free entry
 26622 00004B71 72E7                            jc	short makeendshare_retn	; Failed
 26623 00004B73 EB0E                            JMP     SHORT FREESPOT
 26624                                  
 26625                                  ERRRET3:
 26626 00004B75 F9                              STC
 26627                                  newentry_retn:
 26628 00004B76 C3                              retn
 26629                                  
 26630                                  EXISTENT:
 26631 00004B77 08E4                            OR      AH,AH           ; Check if file is I/O device
 26632 00004B79 7903                            JNS	short NOT_DEV1
 26633 00004B7B E98D00                          JMP     DOOPEN          ; If so, proceed with open
 26634                                  
 26635                                  NOT_DEV1:
 26636 00004B7E E82C01                          call	FREEENT		; Free cluster chain
 26637 00004B81 72F3                            jc	short newentry_retn ; Failed
 26638                                  FREESPOT:
 26639                                  	;test	byte [ATTRIB],8
 26640 00004B83 F606[6B05]08            	test	BYTE [ATTRIB],attr_volume_id
 26641 00004B88 7407                            JZ	short NOTVOLID
 26642 00004B8A 803E[7B05]00                    CMP     BYTE [VOLID],0
 26643 00004B8F 75E4                            JNZ	short ERRRET3	; Can't create a second volume ID
 26644                                  NOTVOLID:
 26645 00004B91 8E06[E405]                      MOV     ES,[CURBUF+2]
 26646 00004B95 89DF                            MOV     DI,BX
 26647                                  
 26648 00004B97 BE[4B05]                        MOV     SI,NAME1
 26649                                  
 26650 00004B9A B90500                          MOV     CX,5
 26651 00004B9D F3A5                            REP     MOVSW
 26652 00004B9F A4                              MOVSB                   ; Move name into dir entry
 26653 00004BA0 A0[6B05]                	MOV	AL,[ATTRIB]
 26654 00004BA3 AA                      	STOSB                   ; Attributes
 26655                                  
 26656                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 26657 00004BA4 B105                            MOV     CL,5            ;FT. assume normal FBUGBUG	;AN000;
 26658                                  ;; File Tagging for Create DOS 4.00
 26659                                  
 26660 00004BA6 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26661 00004BA8 F3AB                            REP     STOSW           ; Zero pad
 26662 00004BAA E899BF                          call	DATE16
 26663 00004BAD 92                              XCHG    AX,DX
 26664 00004BAE AB                              STOSW                   ; dir_time
 26665 00004BAF 92                              XCHG    AX,DX
 26666 00004BB0 AB                              STOSW                   ; dir_date
 26667 00004BB1 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26668 00004BB3 57                              PUSH    DI              ; Correct SI input value
 26669                                  				; 	(recomputed for new buffer)
 26670 00004BB4 AB                              STOSW                   ; Zero dir_first and size
 26671 00004BB5 AB                              STOSW
 26672 00004BB6 AB                              STOSW
 26673                                  updnxt:
 26674 00004BB7 8B36[E205]              	MOV	SI,[CURBUF]
 26675                                  
 26676                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26677                                  
 26678                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26679 00004BBB 26F6440540              	TEST	byte [ES:SI+BUFFINFO.buf_flags],buf_dirty
 26680                                  				;LB. if already dirty		  ;AN000;
 26681 00004BC0 7508                            JNZ	short yesdirty9	;LB.  don't increment dirty count ;AN000;
 26682 00004BC2 E87610                          call	INC_DIRTY_COUNT	;LB.				  ;AN000;
 26683

 26686                                  yesdirty9:

 26734                                  
 26735                                  ; DOSCODE:8AE4h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 26736                                  
 26737                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26738                                  ; DOSCODE:8AA9h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 26739                                  
 26740                                  ; DOOPEN
 26741                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26742                                  ;
 26743                                  ; Inputs:
 26744                                  ;       [THISDPB] points to DPB if file
 26745                                  ;       [THISSFT] points to SFT being used
 26746                                  ;       AH = Device ID byte
 26747                                  ;       If FILE
 26748                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:BX points to start of directory entry
 26749                                  ;           [CURBUF+2]:SI points to dir_first of directory entry
 26750                                  ;       If device
 26751                                  ;           DS:BX points to start of "fake" directory entry
 26752                                  ;           DS:SI points to dir_first of "fake" directory entry
 26753                                  ;               (has DWORD pointer to device header)
 26754                                  ; Function:
 26755                                  ;       Fill in SFT from dir entry
 26756                                  ; Outputs:
 26757                                  ;       CARRY CLEAR
 26758                                  ;       sf_ref_count and sf_mode fields not altered
 26759                                  ;       sf_flags high byte = 0
 26760                                  ;       sf_flags low byte = AH except
 26761                                  ;       sf_flags Bit 6 set (not dirty or not EOF)
 26762                                  ;       sf_attr sf_date sf_time sf_name set from entry
 26763                                  ;       sf_position = 0
 26764                                  ;       If device
 26765                                  ;           sf_devptr = dword at dir_first (pointer to device header)
 26766                                  ;           sf_size = 0
 26767                                  ;       If file
 26768                                  ;           sf_firclus sf_size set from entry
 26769                                  ;           sf_devptr = [THISDPB]
 26770                                  ;           sf_cluspos = 0
 26771                                  ;           sf_lstclus = sf_firclus
 26772                                  ;           sf_dirsec sf_dirpos set
 26773                                  ; DS,SI,BX preserved, others destroyed
 26774                                  ;
 26775                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26776                                  
 26777                                  	;entry	DOOPEN
 26778                                  DOOPEN:
 26779                                  ;	Generate and store attribute
 26780                                  
 26781 00004C0B 88E6                            MOV     DH,AH           ; AH to different place
 26782 00004C0D C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 26783                                  	;add	di,4
 26784 00004C11 83C704                          ADD     DI,SF_ENTRY.sf_attr ; Skip ref_count and mode fields
 26785 00004C14 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL           ; Assume it's a device, devices have an
 26786                                                                  ;   attribute of 0 (for R/O testing etc).
 26787 00004C16 08F6                            OR      DH,DH           ; See if our assumption good.
 26788 00004C18 7807                            JS	short DEV_SFT1	; If device DS=DOSGROUP
 26789 00004C1A 8E1E[E405]                      MOV     DS,[CURBUF+2]
 26790                                  	;mov	al,[BX+0Bh]
 26791 00004C1E 8A470B                          MOV     AL,[BX+dir_entry.dir_attr]
 26792                                  				; If file, get attrib from dir entry
 26793                                  DEV_SFT1:
 26794 00004C21 AA                              STOSB                   ; sf_attr, ES:DI -> sf_flags
 26795                                  
 26796                                  ;	Generate and store flags word
 26797                                  
 26798 00004C22 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26799 00004C24 88F0                            MOV     AL,DH
 26800                                  	;or	al,40h
 26801 00004C26 0C40                            OR      AL,devid_file_clean
 26802 00004C28 AB                              STOSW                   ; sf_flags, ES:DI -> sf_devptr
 26803                                  
 26804                                  ;	Generate and store device pointer
 26805                                  
 26806 00004C29 1E                              PUSH    DS
 26807                                  	;lds	ax,[bx+1Ah]
 26808 00004C2A C5471A                          LDS     AX,[BX+dir_entry.dir_first] ; Assume device
 26809 00004C2D 08F6                            OR      DH,DH
 26810 00004C2F 7805                            JS	short DEV_SFT2
 26811                                  
 26812                                  ;hkn; SS override
 26813 00004C31 36C506[8A05]                    LDS     AX,[SS:THISDPB]	; Was file
 26814                                  DEV_SFT2:
 26815 00004C36 AB                              STOSW 			; store offset
 26816 00004C37 8CD8                            MOV     AX,DS
 26817 00004C39 1F                              POP     DS
 26818 00004C3A AB                      	STOSW			; store segment
 26819                                  				; ES:DI -> sf_firclus
 26820                                  
 26821                                  ;	Generate pointer to, generate and store first cluster 
 26822                                  ;	(irrelevant for devices)
 26823                                  
 26824 00004C3B 56                              PUSH    SI              ; Save pointer to dir_first
 26825 00004C3C A5                              MOVSW                   ; dir_first -> sf_firclus
 26826                                                                  ; DS:SI -> dir_size_l, ES:DI -> sf_time
 26827

 26829                                  
 26830                                  	;sub	si,6

 26832                                  				; DS:SI->dir_time
 26833 00004C40 A5                              MOVSW                   ; dir_time -> sf_time
 26834                                                                  ; DS:SI -> dir_date, ES:DI -> sf_date
 26835 00004C41 A5                              MOVSW                   ; dir_date -> sf_date
 26836                                                                  ; DS:SI -> dir_first, ES:DI -> sf_size
 26837                                  
 26838                                  ;	Generate and store file size (0 for devices)
 26839                                  
 26840 00004C42 AD                              LODSW                   ; skip dir_first, DS:SI -> dir_size_l
 26841 00004C43 AD                              LODSW                   ; dir_size_l in AX , DS:SI -> dir_size_h
 26842 00004C44 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; dir_size_l in CX
 26843 00004C46 AD                              LODSW                   ; dir_size_h (size AX:CX), DS:SI -> ????
 26844 00004C47 08F6                            OR      DH,DH
 26845 00004C49 7904                            JNS	short FILE_SFT1
 26846 00004C4B 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX
 26847 00004C4D 89C1                            MOV     CX,AX           ; Devices are open ended
 26848                                  FILE_SFT1:
 26849 00004C4F 91                              XCHG    AX,CX
 26850 00004C50 AB                              STOSW                   ; Low word of sf_size
 26851 00004C51 91                              XCHG    AX,CX
 26852 00004C52 AB                              STOSW                   ; High word of sf_size
 26853                                                                  ; ES:DI -> sf_position
 26854                                  ; Initialize position to 0
 26855                                  
 26856 00004C53 31C0                            XOR     AX,AX

 26859                                                                  ; ES:DI -> sf_cluspos
 26860

 26865 00004C5B AB                              STOSW                   ; sf_cluspos ; 19h

 26962                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26963                                  ;
 26964                                  ; Procedure Name : FREEENT
 26965                                  ;
 26966                                  ; Inputs:
 26967                                  ;       ES:BP -> DPB
 26968                                  ;       [CURBUF] Set
 26969                                  ;       [CURBUF+2]:BX points to directory entry
 26970                                  ;       [CURBUF+2]:SI points to above dir_first
 26971                                  ; Function:
 26972                                  ;       Free the cluster chain for the entry if present
 26973                                  ; Outputs:
 26974                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 26975                                  ;       (NOTE dir_firclus and dir_size_l/h are wrong)
 26976                                  ; DS BX SI ES BP preserved (BX,SI in meaning, not value) others destroyed
 26977                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 26978                                  
 26979                                  	; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 26980                                  FREEENT:
 26981 00004CAD 1E                              PUSH    DS
 26982 00004CAE C53E[E205]                      LDS     DI,[CURBUF]
 26983 00004CB2 8B0C                            MOV     CX,[SI]         ; Get pointer to clusters
 26984                                  	; 19/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 26985                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 26986 00004CB4 8B5508                  	MOV	DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector+2]  ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 26987                                  ;hkn; SS override
 26988 00004CB7 368916[0706]                    MOV	[SS:HIGH_SECTOR],DX		;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 26989 00004CBC 8B5506                          MOV     DX,[DI+BUFFINFO.buf_sector]
 26990 00004CBF 1F                              POP     DS
 26991 00004CC0 83F902                  	CMP	CX,2
 26992 00004CC3 7235                            JB	short RET1	; Was 0 length file (or mucked Firclus if CX=1)
 26993                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:bp+0Dh]
 26994 00004CC5 263B4E0D                        CMP     CX,[ES:BP+DPB.MAX_CLUSTER]
 26995 00004CC9 772F                            JA	short RET1	; Treat like zero length file (firclus mucked)
 26996 00004CCB 29FB                            SUB     BX,DI
 26997 00004CCD 53                              PUSH    BX              ; Save offset
 26998 00004CCE FF36[0706]              	PUSH	word [HIGH_SECTOR] ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 26999 00004CD2 52                              PUSH    DX              ; Save sector number
 27000 00004CD3 89CB                            MOV     BX,CX
 27001 00004CD5 E8B702                          call	RELEASE         ; Free any data allocated
 27002 00004CD8 5A                              POP     DX
 27003 00004CD9 8F06[0706]                      POP	word [HIGH_SECTOR] ;F.C. >32mb	;AN000;
 27004 00004CDD 7302                            JNC	short GET_BUF_BACK
 27005 00004CDF 5B                              POP     BX
 27006                                  freeent_retn:
 27007 00004CE0 C3                              retn			; Screw up
 27008                                  
 27009                                  GET_BUF_BACK:
 27010                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 27011 00004CE1 C606[4B03]18                    MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_RETRY+Allowed_FAIL
 27012 00004CE6 30C0                            XOR     AL,AL
 27013 00004CE8 E84A0D                  	call	GETBUFFR        ; Get sector back
 27014 00004CEB 5B                              POP     BX              ; Get offset back
 27015 00004CEC 72F2                            jc	short freeent_retn
 27016 00004CEE E869EA                  	call	SET_BUF_AS_DIR
 27017 00004CF1 031E[E205]                      ADD     BX,[CURBUF]	; Correct it for new buffer
 27018 00004CF5 89DE                            MOV     SI,BX

 27021                                  RET1:

 27025                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27026                                  ;
 27027                                  ; Procedure Name : CHECK_VIRT_OPEN
 27028                                  ;
 27029                                  ; CHECK_VIRT_OPEN checks to see if we had performed a "virtual open" (by
 27030                                  ; examining the flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN] to see if it is 1). If we did, then
 27031                                  ; it calls Dev_Close_SFT to decrement the ref. count. It also resets the
 27032                                  ; flag [VIRTUAL_OPEN].
 27033                                  ; No registers affected (including flags).
 27034                                  ; On input, [THISSFT] points to current SFT.
 27035                                  ;
 27036                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27037                                  
 27038                                  CHECK_VIRT_OPEN:
 27039 00004CFC 50                      	PUSH    AX
 27040 00004CFD 9F                              lahf                    ; preserve flags
 27041 00004CFE 803E[A20A]00                    CMP     byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0
 27042 00004D03 7410                            JZ	short ALL_CLOSED
 27043 00004D05 C606[A20A]00                    mov     byte [VIRTUAL_OPEN],0	; reset flag
 27044 00004D0A 06                      	push	es
 27045 00004D0B 57                      	push	di
 27046 00004D0C C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]
 27047 00004D10 E88CF9                          call	DEV_CLOSE_SFT
 27048 00004D13 5F                      	pop	di
 27049 00004D14 07                      	pop	es
 27050                                  
 27051                                  ALL_CLOSED:
 27052 00004D15 9E                              sahf                    ; restore flags
 27053 00004D16 58                              POP     AX
 27054 00004D17 C3                              retn

 27062                                  ;	TITLE	ROM - Miscellaneous routines
 27063                                  ;	NAME	ROM
 27064                                  
 27065                                  ;**	Misc Low level routines for doing simple FCB computations, Cache
 27066                                  ;       reads and writes, I/O optimization, and FAT allocation/deallocation
 27067                                  ;
 27068                                  ;	SKPCLP
 27069                                  ;	FNDCLUS
 27070                                  ;	BUFSEC
 27071                                  ;	BUFRD
 27072                                  ;	BUFWRT
 27073                                  ;	NEXTSEC
 27074                                  ;	OPTIMIZE
 27075                                  ;	FIGREC
 27076                                  ;	ALLOCATE
 27077                                  ;	RESTFATBYT
 27078                                  ;	RELEASE
 27079                                  ;	RELBLKS
 27080                                  ;	GETEOF
 27081                                  ;
 27082                                  ;	Modification history:
 27083                                  ;
 27084                                  ;		Created: ARR 30 March 1983
 27085                                  ;               M039: DB 10/25/90 - Disk read/write optimization.
 27086                                  
 27087                                  ;Break   <FNDCLUS -- Skip over allocation units>
 27088                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27089                                  ;
 27090                                  ; Procedure Name : FNDCLUS
 27091                                  ;
 27092                                  ; Inputs:
 27093                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters to skip
 27094                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 27095                                  ;       [THISSFT] point to SFT
 27096                                  ; Outputs:
 27097                                  ;       BX = Last cluster skipped to
 27098                                  ;       CX = No. of clusters remaining (0 unless EOF)
 27099                                  ;       DX = Position of last cluster
 27100                                  ;       Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 27101                                  ; DI destroyed. No other registers affected.
 27102                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27103                                  
 27104                                  ; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27105                                  ; DOSCODE:8BF2h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 27106                                  ; 25/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 27107                                  ; DOSCODE:8BB7h (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 27108                                  
 27109                                  FNDCLUS:
 27110 00004D18 06                      	PUSH	ES
 27111 00004D19 C43E[9E05]                      LES     DI,[THISSFT]		; setup addressability to SFT
 27112                                  	;;mov	bx,[es:di+1Bh] ; MSDOS 3.3
 27113                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+35h] ; MSDOS 6.0
 27114 00004D1D 268B5D35                	MOV	BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_lstclus]
 27115                                  	;mov	dx,[es:di+19h]
 27116 00004D21 268B5519                        MOV     DX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_cluspos]
 27117 00004D25 09DB                    	OR	BX,BX
 27118 00004D27 7424                    	JZ	short NOCLUS
 27119                                  
 27120 00004D29 29D1                            SUB     CX,DX
 27121 00004D2B 7308                            JNB	short FINDIT
 27122                                  
 27123 00004D2D 01D1                            ADD     CX,DX
 27124 00004D2F 31D2                            XOR     DX,DX
 27125                                  	;mov	bx,[es:di+0Bh]
 27126 00004D31 268B5D0B                        MOV     BX,[ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_firclus]
 27127                                  FINDIT:
 27128 00004D35 07                              POP	ES
 27129 00004D36 E313                    	JCXZ	RET9
 27130                                  
 27131                                  	;entry	SKPCLP
 27132                                  SKPCLP:
 27133 00004D38 E8D808                  	call	UNPACK
 27134 00004D3B 7214                            jc	short fndclus_retn	; retc
 27135                                  
 27136                                  	; 09/09/2018
 27137                                  
 27138                                  	; MSDOS 3.3
 27139                                  	;push	bx
 27140                                  	;mov	bx,di
 27141                                  	;call	IsEOF
 27142                                  	;pop	bx	
 27143                                  	;jae	short RET9
 27144                                  
 27145                                  	; 20/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 27146                                  
 27147                                  	; MSDOS 6.0
 27148 00004D3D 87DF                    	xchg	bx,di
 27149 00004D3F E8BA08                  	call	IsEOF
 27150 00004D42 87DF                    	xchg	bx,di
 27151 00004D44 7305                    	jae	short RET9
 27152

 27169                                  ;Break  <BUFSEC -- BUFFER A SECTOR AND SET UP A TRANSFER>
 27170                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 27171                                  ;
 27172                                  ; Procedure Name : BUFSEC
 27173                                  ;
 27174                                  ; Inputs:
 27175                                  ;       AH = priority of buffer
 27176                                  ;       AL = 0 if buffer must be read, 1 if no pre-read needed
 27177                                  ;       ES:BP = Base of drive parameters
 27178                                  ;       [CLUSNUM] = Physical cluster number
 27179                                  ;       [SECCLUSPOS] = Sector position of transfer within cluster
 27180                                  ;       [BYTCNT1] = Size of transfer
 27181                                  ; Function:
 27182                                  ;       Insure specified sector is in buffer, flushing buffer before
 27183                                  ;       read if necessary.
 27184                                  ; Outputs:
 27185                                  ;       ES:DI = Pointer to buffer
 27186                                  ;       SI = Pointer to transfer address
 27187                                  ;       CX = Number of bytes
 27188                                  ;       [NEXTADD] updated
 27189                                  ;       [TRANS] set to indicate a transfer will occur
 27190                                  ;       Carry set if error (user FAILed to I 24)
 27191                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------

 27193                                  BUFSEC:

 27199 00004D62 E8D00C                  	call	GETBUFFR

 27201

 27216 00004D8D C3                              retn

 27223                                  ;

 27225                                  ; ES:BP Points to DPB
 27226                                  ; Carry set if error (currently user FAILed to I 24)
 27227                                  ;
