 39523                                  ; SHARE_VIOLATION
 39524                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39525                                  ; Inputs:
 39526                                  ;       [THISDPB] Set
 39527                                  ;       AX has error code
 39528                                  ; Function:
 39529                                  ;       Handle Sharing errors
 39530                                  ; Outputs:
 39531                                  ;       Carry set if user says FAIL, causes error_sharing_violation
 39532                                  ;       Carry clear if user wants a retry
 39533                                  ;
 39534                                  ; DS, ES, DI preserved, others destroyed
 39535                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39536                                  
 39537                                  SHARE_VIOLATION:
 39538 00007439 1E                      	PUSH    DS
 39539 0000743A 06                      	PUSH	ES
 39540 0000743B 57                      	PUSH    DI
 39541 0000743C C606[7505]00            	MOV     byte [READOP],0		; All share errors are reading
 39542                                  	;mov	byte [ALLOWED],18h
 39543 00007441 C606[4B03]18            	MOV     byte [ALLOWED],Allowed_FAIL+Allowed_RETRY
 39544 00007446 C42E[8A05]              	LES     BP,[THISDPB]
 39545 0000744A BF0100                  	MOV     DI,1			; Fake some registers
 39546 0000744D 89F9                    	MOV     CX,DI
 39547                                  	;mov	dx,[es:bp+17]
 39548 0000744F 268B5611                	MOV     DX,[ES:BP+DPB.DIR_SECTOR]
 39549 00007453 E883DF                  	call	HARDERR
 39550 00007456 5F                      	POP     DI
 39551 00007457 07                      	POP	ES
 39552 00007458 1F                      	POP     DS
 39553 00007459 3C01                    	CMP     AL,1
 39554 0000745B 74DB                    	jz	short shchk_retn	; 1 = retry, carry clear
 39555 0000745D F9                      	STC
 39556 0000745E C3                      	retn
 39557                                  
 39558                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39559                                  ;   ShareEnd - terminate sharing info on a particular SFT/UID/PID. This does
 39560                                  ;       NOT perform a close, it merely asserts that the sharing information
 39561                                  ;       for the SFT/UID/PID may be safely released.
 39562                                  ;
 39563                                  ;   Inputs:     ES:DI points to an SFT
 39564                                  ;   Outputs:    None
 39565                                  ;   Registers modified: all except DS,ES,DI
 39566                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39567                                  
 39568                                  ShareEnd:
 39569                                  	; 26/07/2019
 39570 0000745F FF1E[9800]              	call	far [JShare+(2*4)]	; 2 = MFTClose
 39571 00007463 C3                      	retn
 39572                                  
 39573                                  ;Break <ShareEnter - attempt to enter a node into the sharing set>
 39574                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39575                                  ;   ShareEnter - perform a retried entry of a nodde into the sharing set. If
 39576                                  ;   the max number of retries is exceeded, we notify the user via int 24.
 39577                                  ;
 39578                                  ;   Inputs:     ThisSFT points to the SFT
 39579                                  ;               WFP_Start points to the WFP
 39580                                  ;   Outputs:    Carry clear => successful entry
 39581                                  ;               Carry set => failed system call
 39582                                  ;   Registers modified: all
 39583                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39584                                  
 39585                                  ShareEnter:
 39586 00007464 51                      	push	cx
 39587                                  retry:
 39588 00007465 8B0E[1A00]              	mov     cx,[RetryCount]
 39589                                  attempt:
 39590 00007469 C43E[9E05]              	les     di,[THISSFT]		; grab sft
 39591 0000746D 31C0                    	XOR     AX,AX
 39592                                   	;mov	[es:di+51],axfff
 39593 0000746F 26894533                	MOV     [ES:DI+SF_ENTRY.sf_MFT],AX ; indicate free SFT
 39594 00007473 51                      	push	cx
 39595 00007474 E8BDFF                  	call    SHARE_CHECK             ; attempt to enter into the sharing set
 39596 00007477 59                      	pop	cx
 39597 00007478 730A                    	jnc	short done		; success, let the user see this
 39598 0000747A E8019E                  	call	Idle                    ; wait a while
 39599 0000747D E2EA                    	loop    attempt                 ; go back for another attempt
 39600 0000747F E8B7FF                  	call    SHARE_VIOLATION         ; signal the problem to the user
 39601 00007482 73E1                    	jnc	short retry		; user said to retry, go do it
 39602                                  done:
 39603 00007484 59                      	pop	cx
 39604 00007485 C3                      	retn
 39605                                  
 39606                                  ;============================================================================
 39607                                  ; EXEPATCH.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 39608                                  ;============================================================================
 39609                                  ; 29/04/2019 - Retro DOS 4.0
 39610                                  
 39611                                  ;** EXEPATCH.ASM 
 39612                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39613                                  ;	Contains the foll:
 39614                                  ;
 39615                                  ;		- code to find and overlay buggy unpack code
 39616                                  ;		- new code to be overlayed on buggy unpack code 
 39617                                  ;		- old code sequence to identify buggy unpack code
 39618                                  ;
 39619                                  ;	Revision history:
 39620                                  ;
 39621                                  ;		Created: 5/14/90
 39622                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39623                                  
 39624                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39625                                  ;
 39626                                  ; M020 : Fix for rational bug - for details see routine header
 39627                                  ; M028 : 4b04 implementation
 39628                                  ; M030 : Fixing bug in EXEPACKPATCH (EXEC_CS is an un-relocated value)
 39629                                  ; M032 : set turnoff bit only if DOS in HMA.
 39630                                  ; M033 : if IP < 2 then not exepacked.
 39631                                  ; M046 : support for a 4th version of exepacked files.
 39632                                  ; M068 : support for copy protected apps.
 39633                                  ; M071 : use A20OFF_COUNT of 10.
 39634                                  ;
 39635                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39636                                  
 39637                                  PATCH1_COM_OFFSET	EQU	06CH
 39638                                  PATCH1_OFFSET		EQU	028H
 39639                                  PATCH1_CHKSUM		EQU	0EF4EH
 39640                                  CHKSUM1_LEN		EQU	11CH/2 ; 142
 39641                                  
 39642                                  PATCH2_COM_OFFSET	EQU	076H
 39643                                  PATCH2_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 39644                                  
 39645                                  	; The strings that start at offset 076h have two possible 
 39646                                  	; check sums that are defined as PATCH2_CHKSUM PATCH2A_CHKSUM
 39647                                  
 39648                                  PATCH2_CHKSUM		EQU	78B2H
 39649                                  CHKSUM2_LEN		EQU	119H/2
 39650                                  PATCH2A_CHKSUM		EQU	1C47H		; M046
 39651                                  CHKSUM2A_LEN		EQU	103H/2		; M046
 39652                                  
 39653                                  PATCH3_COM_OFFSET	EQU	074H
 39654                                  PATCH3_OFFSET		EQU	032H
 39655                                  PATCH3_CHKSUM		EQU	4EDEH
 39656                                  CHKSUM3_LEN		EQU	117H/2
 39657                                  
 39658                                  ;**	Data structure passed for ExecReady call
 39659                                  ;
 39660                                  ;struc ERStruc
 39661                                  ; .ER_Reserved:	resw	1	; reserved, should be zero
 39662                                  ; .ER_Flags:	resw	1
 39663                                  ; .ER_ProgName:	resd	1	; ptr to ASCIIZ str of prog name
 39664                                  ; .ER_PSP:	resw	1	; PSP of the program
 39665                                  ; .ER_StartAddr: resd	1	; Start CS:IP of the program
 39666                                  ; .ER_ProgSize:	resd	1	; Program size including PSP
 39667                                  ; .size:
 39668                                  ;endstruc
 39669                                  
 39670                                  ;DOSCODE SEGMENT
 39671                                  
 39672                                  	; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39673                                  	; DOSCODE:B3DDh (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 39674                                  
 39675                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 39676                                  	; DOSCODE:B37Ah (MSDOS 5.0, MSDOS.SYS)
 39677                                  
 39678                                  ; M028 - BEGIN
 39679                                  
 39680                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39681                                  ;
 39682                                  ;	Procedure Name		: ExecReady
 39683                                  ;
 39684                                  ;	Input			: DS:DX -> ERStruc (see exe.inc)
 39685                                  ;
 39686                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39687                                  
 39688                                  ExecReady:
 39689 00007486 89D6                    	mov	si,dx			; move the pointer into a friendly one
 39690                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 39691                                  	; 17/12/2022
 39692 00007488 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 39693                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; COM or EXE ?
 39694 0000748C 7413                    	jz	short er_setver		; only setver for .COM files
 39695                                  
 39696                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 39697 0000748E 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 39698 00007491 83C010                  	add	ax,10h
 39699 00007494 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 39700                                  
 39701                                  	;mov	cx,[si+10]
 39702 00007496 8B4C0A                  	mov	cx,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr]   ; M030
 39703                                  	;mov	cx,[si+12]
 39704 00007499 8B440C                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_StartAddr+2] ; M030
 39705                                  
 39706 0000749C 36FF16[1212]            	call	[ss:FixExePatch]
 39707                                  	
 39708                                  	; 04/12/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS compatibility)
 39709                                  	;call	[ss:Rational386PatchPtr]
 39710                                  
 39711                                  er_setver:
 39712                                  	;;test	word [si+2],2		; Q: is this an overlay
 39713                                  	; 17/12/2022
 39714 000074A1 F6440202                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY ; 2
 39715                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_OVERLAY
 39716 000074A5 7518                    	jnz	short er_chkdoshi	; Y: set A20OFF_COUNT if DOS high
 39717                                  					; N: set up lie version first
 39718 000074A7 1E                      	push	ds
 39719 000074A8 56                      	push	si
 39720                                  	;lds	si,[si+4]
 39721 000074A9 C57404                  	lds	si,[si+ERStruc.ER_ProgName]
 39722 000074AC E870ED                  	call	Scan_Execname1
 39723 000074AF E881ED                  	call	Scan_Special_Entries
 39724 000074B2 5E                      	pop	si
 39725 000074B3 1F                      	pop	ds
 39726                                  	;mov	es,[si+8]
 39727 000074B4 8E4408                  	mov	es,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]
 39728 000074B7 36A1[BD0E]              	mov	ax,[ss:SPECIAL_VERSION]
 39729 000074BB 26A34000                	mov	[es:PDB.Version],ax
 39730                                  
 39731                                  er_chkdoshi:
 39732 000074BF 36803E[1112]00          	cmp	byte [ss:DosHasHMA],0	; M032: Q: is dos in HMA (M021)
 39733 000074C5 741F                    	je	short er_done		; M032: N: done
 39734                                  
 39735                                  					; M068 - Start
 39736                                  	;mov	ax,[si+8]
 39737 000074C7 8B4408                  	mov	ax,[si+ERStruc.ER_PSP]	; ax = PSP
 39738                                  
 39739                                  	;or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],4
 39740 000074CA 36800E[8600]04          	or	byte [ss:DOS_FLAG],EXECA20OFF ; Set bit to signal int 21
 39741                                  					; ah = 25 & ah= 49. See dossym.inc 
 39742                                  					; under TAG M003 & M009 for 
 39743                                  					; explanation
 39744                                  	;;test	word [si+2],1
 39745                                  	; 17/12/2022
 39746 000074D0 F6440201                	test	byte [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; 1
 39747                                  	;test	word [si+ERStruc.ER_Flags],ER_EXE ; Q: COM file
 39748 000074D4 7507                    	jnz	short er_setA20		; N: inc a20off_count, set 
 39749                                  					;    a20off_psp and ret
 39750 000074D6 1E                         	push	ds
 39751 000074D7 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; DS = load segment of com file.
 39752 000074D9 E85D03                  	call	IsCopyProt		; check if copy protected
 39753 000074DC 1F                      	pop	ds
 39754                                  
 39755                                  er_setA20:
 39756                                  	; We need to inc the A20OFF_COUNT here. Note that if the count
 39757                                  	; is non-zero at this point it indicates that the A20 is to be 
 39758                                  	; turned off for that many int 21 calls made by the app. In 
 39759                                  	; addition the A20 has to be turned off when we exit from this 
 39760                                  	; call. Hence the inc.
 39761                                  
 39762 000074DD 36FE06[8500]            	inc	byte [ss:A20OFF_COUNT]		
 39763 000074E2 36A3[6300]              	mov	[ss:A20OFF_PSP],ax	; set the PSP for which A20 is to be
 39764                                  					; turned OFF.
 39765                                  er_done:				; M068 - End
 39766 000074E6 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 39767 000074E8 C3                      	retn
 39768                                  
 39769                                  ; M028 - END
 39770                                  
 39771                                  
 39772                                  ; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)
 39773                                  %if 0
 39774                                  
 39775                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39776                                  ;
 39777                                  ; procedure : Rational386Patch
 39778                                  ;
 39779                                  ; Older versions of the Rational DOS Extender have several bugs which trash
 39780                                  ; 386 registers (usually just the high word of 32 bit registers) during
 39781                                  ; interrupt processing. Lotus 123 3.1+ is a popular application that uses a
 39782                                  ; version of the Rational extender with the 32 bit register trashing bugs.
 39783                                  ;
 39784                                  ; This routine applies patches to the Rational DOS Extender to work around
 39785                                  ; most of the register trashing bugs.
 39786                                  ;
 39787                                  ; Note that there are additional register trashing bugs not fixed by these
 39788                                  ; patches. In particular, the high word of ESP and the FS and GS registers
 39789                                  ; may be modified on interrupts.
 39790                                  ;
 39791                                  ; There are two different Rational DOS Extender patchs in this module.
 39792                                  ; Rational386Patch is to correct 386 register trashing bugs on 386 or later
 39793                                  ; processors. This patch code is executed when MS-DOS is running on a 386
 39794                                  ; or later processor, regardless of whether MS-DOS is running in the HMA
 39795                                  ; or not.
 39796                                  ;
 39797                                  ; The other Rational patch routine (RationalPatch, below) fixes a register
 39798                                  ; trashing problem on 286 processors, and is only executed if MS-DOS is
 39799                                  ; running in the HMA.
 39800                                  ;
 39801                                  ; This patch detection and replacement is based on an example supplied by
 39802                                  ; Ben Williams at Rational.
 39803                                  ;
 39804                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39805                                  
 39806                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 39807                                  ; DOSCODE:B448h (MSDOS 6.21, MSDOS.SYS)
 39808                                  
 39809                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39810                                  ;
 39811                                  ; INPUT : ES = segment where program got loaded
 39812                                  ;
 39813                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39814                                  
 39815                                  rpFind1:
 39816                                  	db	0FAh, 0E4h, 21h, 60h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 43h, 8Bh, 16h
 39817                                  
 39818                                  rpFind1Len equ	$ - rpFind1
 39819                                  
 39820                                  ;	cli
 39821                                  ;	in	al, 21h
 39822                                  ;	pusha
 39823                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 39824                                  ;	out	43h, al
 39825                                  ;	mov	dx, ...
 39826                                  
 39827                                  rpFind1a:
 39828                                  	db	0B0h, 0Eh, 0E6h, 37h, 33h, 0C0h, 0E6h, 0F2h
 39829                                  
 39830                                  rpFind1aLen equ	$ - rpFind1a
 39831                                  
 39832                                  ;	mov	al, 0Eh
 39833                                  ;	out	37h, al
 39834                                  ;	xor	ax, ax
 39835                                  ;	out	0F2h, al
 39836                                  
 39837                                  ; bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 39838                                  
 39839                                  rpFind2:
 39840                                  	db	0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 39841                                  
 39842                                  rpFind2Len equ	$ - rpFind2
 39843                                  
 39844                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0	;may be preceeded by PUSH CX (51h)
 39845                                  
 39846                                  rpFind3:
 39847                                  	db	0Fh, 22h, 0C0h, 0EAh
 39848                                  
 39849                                  rpFind3Len equ	$ - rpFind3
 39850                                  
 39851                                  ;	mov	cr0, eax	;may be preceeded by POP CX (59h)
 39852                                  ;	jmp	far ptr xxx	;change far ptr to go to replace3
 39853                                  ;	mov	ss, bx		;8E D3 ... and come back at or after this
 39854                                  
 39855                                  ; note, there is no rpRepl1 string
 39856                                  
 39857                                  rpRepl2:
 39858                                   	db	66h, 50h, 51h, 0Fh, 20h, 0C0h
 39859                                  
 39860                                  rpRepl2Len equ	$ - rpRepl2
 39861                                  
 39862                                  ;	push	eax
 39863                                  ;	push	cx
 39864                                  ;	mov	eax, cr0
 39865                                  
 39866                                  rpRepl3:
 39867                                  	db	8Eh, 0D3h, 59h, 66h, 58h
 39868                                  
 39869                                  rpRepl3Len equ	$ - rpRepl3
 39870                                  
 39871                                  ;	mov	ss, bx
 39872                                  ;	pop	cx
 39873                                  ;	pop	eax
 39874                                  
 39875                                  ; bug # 2 -- loss of high EAX and ESI on 386+ only if VCPI
 39876                                  
 39877                                  rpFind4:
 39878                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 39879                                  
 39880                                  rpFind4Len equ	$ - rpFind4
 39881                                  
 39882                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 39883                                  ;	pop	ax
 39884                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 39885                                  
 39886                                  rpFind5:
 39887                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 0CDh, 67h, 8Bh, 0E1h, 0FFh, 0E3h
 39888                                  
 39889                                  rpFind5Len equ	$ - rpFind5
 39890                                  
 39891                                  ;	mov	ax, DE0Ch
 39892                                  ;	int	67h
 39893                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 39894                                  ;	jmp	bx
 39895                                  
 39896                                  rpRepl4:
 39897                                  	db	93h, 58h, 8Bh, 0CCh
 39898                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 0A3h
 39899                                  
 39900                                  rpRepl4o1Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 39901                                  
 39902                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39903                                  	db	02Eh, 066h, 89h, 36h
 39904                                  
 39905                                  rpRepl4o2Len equ $ - rpRepl4
 39906                                  
 39907                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39908                                  
 39909                                  rpRepl4Len equ	$ - rpRepl4
 39910                                  
 39911                                  ;	xchg	bx, ax
 39912                                  ;	pop	ax
 39913                                  ;	mov	cx, sp
 39914                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], eax
 39915                                  ;	mov	dword ptr cs:[xxxx], esi
 39916                                  
 39917                                  rpRepl5:
 39918                                  	db	8Bh, 0E1h
 39919                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 0A1h
 39920                                  
 39921                                  rpRepl5o1Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 39922                                  
 39923                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39924                                  	db	2Eh, 66h, 8Bh, 36h
 39925                                  
 39926                                  rpRepl5o2Len equ $ - rpRepl5
 39927                                  
 39928                                  	db	00h, 00h
 39929                                  	db	0FFh, 0E3h
 39930                                  
 39931                                  rpRepl5Len equ	$ - rpRepl5
 39932                                  
 39933                                  ;	mov	sp, cx
 39934                                  ;	mov	eax, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 39935                                  ;	mov	esi, dword ptr cs:[xxxx]
 39936                                  ;	jmp	bx
 39937                                  
 39938                                  ; bug # 3 -- loss of high EAX, EBX, ECX, EDX on 386+ only if VCPI
 39939                                  
 39940                                  rpFind6:
 39941                                  	db	0FAh, 52h, 51h
 39942                                  
 39943                                  rpFind6Len equ	$ - rpFind6
 39944                                  
 39945                                  ;	cli
 39946                                  ;	push	dx
 39947                                  ;	push	cx
 39948                                  
 39949                                  rpFind7a:
 39950                                  	db	0B8h, 0Ch, 0DEh, 66h, 26h, 0FFh, 1Eh
 39951                                  
 39952                                  rpFind7aLen equ	$ - rpFind7a
 39953                                  
 39954                                  ;	mov	ax, 0DE0Ch
 39955                                  ;	call	fword ptr es:[xxxx]
 39956                                  
 39957                                  rpFind7b:
 39958                                  	db	59h, 5Ah, 5Bh
 39959                                  
 39960                                  rpFind7bLen equ	$ - rpFind7b
 39961                                  
 39962                                  ;	pop	cx
 39963                                  ;	pop	dx
 39964                                  ;	pop	bx
 39965                                  
 39966                                  rpRepl6 :
 39967                                  	db	0FAh, 66h, 50h, 66h, 53h, 66h, 51h, 66h, 52h
 39968                                  
 39969                                  rpRepl6Len equ	$ - rpRepl6
 39970                                  
 39971                                  ;	cli
 39972                                  ;	push	eax
 39973                                  ;	push	ebx
 39974                                  ;	push	ecx
 39975                                  ;	push	edx
 39976                                  
 39977                                  rpRepl7:
 39978                                  	db	66h, 5Ah, 66h, 59h, 66h, 5Bh, 66h, 58h, 5Bh
 39979                                  
 39980                                  rpRepl7Len equ	$ - rpRepl7
 39981                                  
 39982                                  ;	pop	edx
 39983                                  ;	pop	ecx
 39984                                  ;	pop	ebx
 39985                                  ;	pop	eax
 39986                                  ;	pop	bx
 39987                                  
 39988                                  ; bug # 4 -- loss of high EAX and EBX on 386+ only if VCPI
 39989                                  
 39990                                  rpFind8:
 39991                                   	db	60h, 06h, 1Eh, 0B8h, 00h, 00h, 8Eh, 0D8h
 39992                                  
 39993                                  rpFind8Len equ	$ - rpFind8
 39994                                  
 39995                                  ;	pusha
 39996                                  ;	push	es
 39997                                  ;	push	ds
 39998                                  ;	mov	ax, dgroup	;jump back to here from replace8
 39999                                  ;	mov	ds, ax
 40000                                  
 40001                                  rpFind9 :
 40002                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 61h
 40003                                  
 40004                                  rpFind9Len equ	$ - rpFind9
 40005                                  
 40006                                  ;	pop	ds
 40007                                  ;	pop	es
 40008                                  ;	popa
 40009                                  
 40010                                  rpRepl8:
 40011                                   	db	66h, 60h, 06h, 1Eh
 40012                                  
 40013                                  rpRepl8Len equ	$ - rpRepl8
 40014                                  
 40015                                  ;	pushad
 40016                                  ;	push	es
 40017                                  ;	push	ds
 40018                                  
 40019                                  rpRepl9:
 40020                                  	db	1Fh, 07h, 66h, 61h, 0C3h
 40021                                  
 40022                                  rpRepl9Len equ	$ - rpRepl9
 40023                                  
 40024                                  ;	pop	ds
 40025                                  ;	pop	es
 40026                                  ;	popad
 40027                                  ;	retn			;no need to jmp back to main-line
 40028                                  
 40029                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40030                                  
 40031                                  struc SearchPair
 40032                                   .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 40033                                   .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 40034                                   .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40035                                   .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40036                                   .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 40037                                   .size:
 40038                                  endstruc
 40039                                  
 40040                                  ;rpBug1Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind2, rpFind2Len, offset rpFind3, rpFind3Len, 20h>
 40041                                  
 40042                                  rpBug1Strs:
 40043                                  	dw	rpFind2
 40044                                  	dw	rpFind2Len ; 3
 40045                                  	dw	rpFind3
 40046                                  	dw	rpFind3Len ; 4
 40047                                  	dw	20h
 40048                                  
 40049                                  ;rpBug2Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind4, rpFind4Len, offset rpFind5, rpFind5Len, 80h>
 40050                                  
 40051                                  rpBug2Strs:
 40052                                  	dw	rpFind4
 40053                                  	dw	rpFind4Len ; 4
 40054                                  	dw	rpFind5
 40055                                  	dw	rpFind5Len ; 9
 40056                                  	dw	80h
 40057                                  
 40058                                  ;rpBug3Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind6, rpFind6Len, offset rpFind7a, rpFind7aLen, 80h>
 40059                                  
 40060                                  rpBug3Strs:
 40061                                  	dw	rpFind6
 40062                                  	dw	rpFind6Len ; 3
 40063                                  	dw	rpFind7a
 40064                                  	dw	rpFind7aLen ; 7
 40065                                  	dw	80h
 40066                                  
 40067                                  ;rpBug4Strs SearchPair	<offset rpFind8, 4, offset rpFind9, rpFind9Len, 80h>
 40068                                  
 40069                                  rpBug4Strs:
 40070                                  	dw	rpFind8
 40071                                  	dw	4
 40072                                  	dw	rpFind9
 40073                                  	dw	rpFind9Len ; 3
 40074                                  	dw	80h
 40075                                  
 40076                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40077                                  
 40078                                  struc StackVars
 40079                                   .sv_wVersion:	resw 1		; Rational extender version #
 40080                                   .sv_cbCodeSeg: resw 1		; code seg size to scan
 40081                                   .sv_pPatch:	resw 1		; offset of next avail patch byte
 40082                                   .size:
 40083                                  endstruc
 40084                                  
 40085                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40086                                  
 40087                                  ; 22/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 40088                                  
 40089                                  Rational386Patch:
 40090                                  	; Do a few quick checks to see if this looks like a Rational
 40091                                  	; Extended application. Hopefully this will quickly weed out
 40092                                  	; most non Rational apps.
 40093                                  
 40094                                  	cmp	word [es:0],395		; version number goes here - versions
 40095                                  	jae	short rp3QuickOut	;   3.95+ don't need patching
 40096                                  
 40097                                  	cmp	word [es:0Ch],20h	; always has this value here
 40098                                  	jne	short rp3QuickOut
 40099                                  
 40100                                  	push	ax
 40101                                  
 40102                                  	mov	ax,18h 			; extender has 18h at
 40103                                  	cmp	[es:24],ax		;   offsets 24, 28, & 36
 40104                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 40105                                  	cmp	[es:28],ax
 40106                                  	jne	short rp3QO_ax
 40107                                  	cmp	[es:36],ax
 40108                                  	je	short rp3Maybe
 40109                                  rp3QO_ax:
 40110                                  	pop	ax
 40111                                  rp3QuickOut:
 40112                                  	retn
 40113                                  
 40114                                  ; It might be the rational extender, do more extensive checking
 40115                                  
 40116                                  rp3Maybe:
 40117                                  	cld
 40118                                  	push	bx			; note ax pushed above
 40119                                  	push	cx
 40120                                  	push	dx
 40121                                  	push	si
 40122                                  	push	di
 40123                                  	push	es
 40124                                  	push	ds			; we use all of them
 40125                                  	push	bp
 40126                                  	sub	sp,StackVars.size  ; 6	; make space for stack variables
 40127                                  	mov	bp,sp
 40128                                  
 40129                                  	push	cs
 40130                                  	pop	ds
 40131                                  
 40132                                  	mov	ax,[es:0]		; save version #
 40133                                  	;mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],ax
 40134                                  	mov	[bp],ax	
 40135                                  					; check that binary version # matches
 40136                                  	call	VerifyVersion		;   ascii string
 40137                                  	jne	short rp3Exit_j
 40138                                  
 40139                                  ; Looks like this is it, find where to put the patch code.  The
 40140                                  ; patch will be located on top of Rational code specific to 80286
 40141                                  ; processors, so these patchs MUST NOT be applied if running on
 40142                                  ; an 80286 system.
 40143                                  
 40144                                  	; Rational says the code to patch will never be beyond offset 46xxh
 40145                                  
 40146                                  	mov	cx,4500h		; force search len to 4700h (searches
 40147                                  	;mov	[bp+2],cx
 40148                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg],cx	; start at offset 200h)
 40149                                  
 40150                                  	mov	es,[es:20h]		; es=code segment
 40151                                  
 40152                                  	mov	si,rpFind1		; string to find
 40153                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1Len ; 10	; length to match
 40154                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq		; look for code seq
 40155                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 40156                                  
 40157                                  ; According to Rational, some very old versions of the extender may not
 40158                                  ; have the find1 code sequence. If the find1 code wasn't found above,
 40159                                  ; try an alternative patch area which is on top of NEC 98xx switching code.
 40160                                  
 40161                                  	mov	si,rpFind1a
 40162                                  	mov	dx,rpFind1aLen  ;8
 40163                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 40164                                  	jz	short rpGotPatch
 40165                                  
 40166                                  rp3Exit_j:
 40167                                  	jmp	rp3Exit
 40168                                  
 40169                                  ; Found the location to write patch code! DI = offset in code seg.
 40170                                  
 40171                                  rpGotPatch:
 40172                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40173                                  	mov	[bp-StackVars.sv_pPatch],di	; save patch pointer
 40174                                  
 40175                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40176                                  ; Bug # 1 -- loss of high EAX on 386+ if not VCPI or DPMI
 40177                                  
 40178                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],381
 40179                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],381 ; only need bug 1 if version
 40180                                  	cmp	word [bp],381
 40181                                  	jae	short rpBug2			;   < 3.81
 40182                                  
 40183                                  	mov	bx,rpBug1Strs			; locate find2 & find3 code
 40184                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40185                                  	jc	short rpBug2
 40186                                  
 40187                                  ; si = rpFind2 offset, di = rpFind3 offset
 40188                                  
 40189                                  	push	di
 40190                                  	mov	di,si				; rpFind2 offset
 40191                                  	mov	dx,rpFind2Len ; 3
 40192                                  
 40193                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],51h	 	; find2 preceeded by push cx?
 40194                                  	jne	short rp_no_cx
 40195                                  
 40196                                  	dec	di				;   yes, gobble up push cx too
 40197                                  	inc	dx
 40198                                  rp_no_cx:
 40199                                  	mov	si,rpRepl2			; patch out find2 sequence
 40200                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl2Len  ; 6
 40201                                  	call	GenPatch
 40202

 40204                                  	cmp	byte [es:di-1],59h 		; find3 preceeded by pop cx?

 40208                                  rp_no_cx2:
 40209                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 40210                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; change offset of far jmp
 40211                                  	;mov	[es:di+4],ax
 40212                                  	mov	[es:di+rpFind3Len],ax		;   to go to patch code

 40216                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl3Len ; 5

 40220                                  	add	bx,rpFind3Len+4	 ; 8		; skip over find3 and far jmp
 40221                                  	call	GenJump 			; jmp back from patch area
 40222                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40223                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch], di	;   to main-line, update patch
 40224                                  						;   area pointer
 40225                                  
 40226                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40227                                  ; Bug # 2 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 40228                                  
 40229                                  rpBug2:
 40230                                  	mov	bx,rpBug2Strs			; locate find4 & find5 code
 40231                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40232                                  	jc	short rpBug3
 40233                                  
 40234                                  ; si = rpFind4 offset, di = rpFind5 offset
 40235                                  
 40236                                  	;push	word [bp+4]
 40237                                  	push	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; save current patch pointer
 40238                                  						;   (where repl4 goes)
 40239                                  	push	di				; save find5 offset
 40240                                  
 40241                                  	mov	di,si
 40242                                  	mov	dx,rpFind4Len ; 4
 40243                                  	mov	si,rpRepl4
 40244                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl4Len ; 15
 40245                                  	call	GenPatch			; patch out find4 code
 40246                                  
 40247                                  	pop	di				; find5 offset
 40248                                  	add	di,5				; keep 5 bytes of find5 code
 40249                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 40250                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; jump to patch area
 40251                                  	push	bx				; save repl5 location
 40252                                  	call	GenJump
 40253                                  
 40254                                  	mov	si,rpRepl5			; copy repl5 code to patch
 40255                                  	mov	cx,rpRepl5Len  ; 15		;   area -- it has a jmp bx
 40256                                  	call	CopyPatch			;   so no need to jmp back to
 40257                                  						;   main-line code
 40258                                  
 40259                                  ; patches have been made, now update the patch code to store/load dwords just
 40260                                  ; after the code in the patch area
 40261                                  
 40262                                  	pop	di				; repl5 location
 40263                                  	pop	si				; repl4 location
 40264                                  
 40265                                  	;mov	ax,[bp+4]
 40266                                  	mov	ax,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]	; (where dwords go)
 40267                                  
 40268                                  	;mov	[es:si+7],ax
 40269                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o1Len],ax		; offset for EAX
 40270                                  	;mov	[es:di+5],ax
 40271                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o1Len],ax
 40272                                  	add	ax,4
 40273                                  	;mov	[es:si+0Dh],ax
 40274                                  	mov	[es:si+rpRepl4o2Len],ax		; offset for ESI
 40275                                  	;mov	[es:di+0Bh],ax
 40276                                  	mov	[es:di+rpRepl5o2Len],ax
 40277                                  
 40278                                  	;add	word [bp+4],8
 40279                                  	add	word [bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],8	; reserve space for 2 dwords in
 40280                                  						; patch area
 40281                                  
 40282                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40283                                  ; Bug # 3 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 40284                                  
 40285                                  rpBug3:
 40286                                  	mov	bx,rpBug3Strs			; locate find6 & find7a code
 40287                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40288                                  	jc	short rpBug4
 40289                                  
 40290                                  	;add	di,9
 40291                                  	add	di,rpFind7aLen + 2		; skip over offset in find7a
 40292                                  	push	si				;   code and locate find7b
 40293                                  	mov	si,rpFind7b			;   sequence
 40294                                  	mov	dx,rpFind7bLen ; 3
 40295                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di
 40296                                  	pop	si

 40298                                  
 40299                                  	push	di				; save find7b code offset
 40300                                  
 40301                                  	mov	di,si
 40302                                  	mov	dx,rpFind6Len ; 3

 40306

 40312

 40314                                  ; Bug # 4 -- loss of high regs on 386+ under VCPI only
 40315                                  
 40316                                  rpBug4:
 40317                                  	;cmp	word [bp+0],360
 40318                                  	;cmp	word [bp+StackVars.sv_wVersion],360 ; only applies if

 40320                                  	jbe	short rp3Exit 			; version > 3.60 and < 3.95
 40321

 40323                                  	call	FindBadCode
 40324                                  	jc	short rp3Exit

 40338

 40342

 40345                                  	pop	bp
 40346                                  	pop	ds
 40347                                  	pop	es
 40348                                  	pop	di

 40350                                  	pop	dx

 40354                                  	retn
 40355                                  
 40356                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40357                                  ;
 40358                                  ; FindBadCode
 40359                                  ;
 40360                                  ; Searches Rational code segment looking for a pair of find strings (all
 40361                                  ; patches have at least two find strings).
 40362                                  ;
 40363                                  ; Entry:
 40364                                  ;	ES    = code segment to search
 40365                                  ;	DS:BX = search pair structure for this search
 40366                                  ;	[bp].sv_cbCodeSeg = length of code seg to search
 40367                                  ;
 40368                                  ; Exit:
 40369                                  ;	CY flag clear if both strings found, and
 40370                                  ;	SI    = offset in ES of 1st string
 40371                                  ;	DI    = offset in ES of 2nd string
 40372                                  ;	CY set if either string not found, or strings too far apart
 40373                                  ;
 40374                                  ; Used:
 40375                                  ;	CX
 40376                                  ;
 40377                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40378                                  
 40379                                  ;struc SearchPair
 40380                                  ; .sp_off1: resw 1	; offset of 1st search string
 40381                                  ; .sp_len1: resw 1	; length of 1st search string
 40382                                  ; .sp_off2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40383                                  ; .sp_len2: resw 1	; 2nd string
 40384                                  ; .sp_diff: resw 1	; max difference between offsets
 40385                                  ; .size:
 40386                                  ;endstruc
 40387                                  
 40388                                  FindBadCode:
 40389                                  	;mov	cx,[bp+2]
 40390                                  	mov	cx,[bp+StackVars.sv_cbCodeSeg]	; search length
 40391                                  
 40392                                  	mov	si,[bx]	; mov si,[bx+0]
 40393                                  	;mov	si,[bx+Searchpair.sp_off1] ; ds:si -> search string
 40394                                  	
 40395                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+2]
 40396                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len1] ; dx = search len
 40397                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq
 40398                                  	jnz	short fbc_error		; done if 1st not found
 40399                                  
 40400                                  	push	di			; save 1st string offset
 40401                                  
 40402                                  	;mov	si,[bx+4]
 40403                                  	mov	si,[bx+SearchPair.sp_off2]
 40404                                  	;mov	dx,[bx+6]
 40405                                  	mov	dx,[bx+SearchPair.sp_len2]
 40406                                  	call	ScanCodeSeq_di		; don't change flags after this!
 40407                                  
 40408                                  	pop	si			; restore 1st string offset
 40409                                  	jnz	short fbc_error
 40410                                  
 40411                                  	mov	ax,di			; sanity check that
 40412                                  	sub	ax,si			;   si < di && di - si <= allowed diff
 40413                                  	jc	short fbc_error
 40414                                  	;cmp	ax,[bx+8]
 40415                                  	cmp	ax,[bx+SearchPair.sp_diff]
 40416                                  	ja	short fbc_error
 40417                                  
 40418                                  	clc
 40419                                  	retn
 40420                                  
 40421                                  fbc_error:
 40422                                  	stc
 40423                                  	retn
 40424                                  
 40425                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40426                                  ;
 40427                                  ; GenPatch
 40428                                  ;
 40429                                  ; Generate a patch sequence. 1) insert a jump at the buggy code location
 40430                                  ; (jumps to the patch code area), 2) copy the selected patch code to the
 40431                                  ; patch area, 3) insert a jump from the patch area back to the main-line
 40432                                  ; code.
 40433                                  ;
 40434                                  ; Entry:
 40435                                  ;	ES:DI = start of buggy code to be patched
 40436                                  ;	DX    = length of buggy code to be patched
 40437                                  ;	DS:SI = replacement patch code
 40438                                  ;	CX    = length of replacement patch code
 40439                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 40440                                  ;
 40441                                  ; Exit:
 40442                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after generated patch code
 40443                                  ;
 40444                                  ; Used:
 40445                                  ;	AX, BX, SI, Flags
 40446                                  ;
 40447                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40448                                  
 40449                                  GenPatch:
 40450                                  	push	di			;save offset of buggy code
 40451                                  
 40452                                  	;mov	bx,[bp+4]
 40453                                  	mov	bx,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch]
 40454                                  					;jump from buggy code to patch area
 40455                                  	call	GenJump
 40456                                  
 40457                                  	call	CopyPatch		;copy replacement code to patch area
 40458                                  
 40459                                  	pop	bx			;offset of buggy code + buggy code
 40460                                  	add	bx,dx			;  length = return from patch offset
 40461                                  
 40462                                  	call	GenJump 		;jump from patch area back to main-
 40463                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40464                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di
 40465                                  					;  line code, update patch pointer
 40466                                  	retn
 40467                                  
 40468                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40469                                  ;
 40470                                  ; CopyPatch
 40471                                  ;
 40472                                  ; Copies patch code to patch location.
 40473                                  ;
 40474                                  ; Entry:
 40475                                  ;	DS:SI = patch code to be copied
 40476                                  ;	ES    = segment of code to patch
 40477                                  ;	CX    = length of code to copy
 40478                                  ;	[bp].sv_pPatch = offset in ES of where to copy patch code
 40479                                  ;
 40480                                  ; Exit:
 40481                                  ;	DI, [bp].sv_pPatch = byte after copied patch code
 40482                                  ;
 40483                                  ; Used:
 40484                                  ;	SI, Flags
 40485                                  ;
 40486                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40487                                  
 40488                                  CopyPatch:
 40489                                  	push	cx
 40490                                  	;mov	di,[bp+4]
 40491                                  	mov	di,[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch] ;patch pointer is the dest offset
 40492                                  	cld
 40493                                  	rep movsb
 40494                                  	pop	cx
 40495                                  	;mov	[bp+4],di
 40496                                  	mov	[bp+StackVars.sv_pPatch],di ;update net pointer location
 40497                                  	retn
 40498                                  
 40499                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40500                                  ;
 40501                                  ; GenJump
 40502                                  ;
 40503                                  ; Generates a rel16 JMP instruction at location 'from' to location 'to'.
 40504                                  ;
 40505                                  ; Entry:
 40506                                  ;	ES:DI = from location (where to put jmp instruction)
 40507                                  ;	BX    = to location (where to jump to)
 40508                                  ;
 40509                                  ; Exit:
 40510                                  ;	DI = byte after generated jump
 40511                                  ;
 40512                                  ; Used:
 40513                                  ;	AX
 40514                                  ;
 40515                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40516                                  
 40517                                  GenJump:
 40518                                  	mov	al,0E9h		; jmp rel16 opcode
 40519                                  	stosb
 40520                                  
 40521                                  	mov	ax,bx		; calc offset to 'to' location
 40522                                  	sub	ax,di
 40523                                  	sub	ax,2
 40524                                  
 40525                                  	stosw			; output offset
 40526                                  
 40527                                  	retn
 40528                                  
 40529                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40530                                  ;
 40531                                  ; ScanCodeSeq
 40532                                  ;
 40533                                  ; Looks for a pattern pointed to by DS:SI & len DX in ES:200 to ES:200+CX-1
 40534                                  ;
 40535                                  ; returns in ES:DI the start of the pattern if Zero flag is set
 40536                                  ;
 40537                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40538                                  
 40539                                  ScanCodeSeq:
 40540                                  	mov	di,200h
 40541                                  ScanCodeSeq_di:
 40542                                  	push	cx
 40543                                  	sub	cx,dx
 40544                                  	inc	cx
 40545                                  scsagain:
 40546                                  	push	si
 40547                                  	push	di
 40548                                  	push	cx
 40549                                  	mov	cx,dx
 40550                                  	rep	cmpsb
 40551                                  	pop	cx
 40552                                  	pop	di
 40553                                  	pop	si
 40554                                  	je	short scsfound
 40555                                  	inc	di
 40556                                  	loop	scsagain
 40557                                  scsfound:
 40558                                  	pop	cx
 40559                                  vvexit:		; 18/12/2022
 40560                                  	retn
 40561                                  	
 40562                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40563                                  ;
 40564                                  ; VerifyVersion
 40565                                  ;
 40566                                  ; Checks whether the binary version from ES:0 matches the ASCII version
 40567                                  ; from ES:2A.
 40568                                  ;
 40569                                  ;       Entry: AX = binary version number 
 40570                                  ;       Exit : Z flag set if version numbers match
 40571                                  ;
 40572                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 40573                                  
 40574                                  VerifyVersion:
 40575                                  	mov	si,[es:2Ah]		; offset of version number
 40576                                  					;  in ascii
 40577                                  	mov	bl,10
 40578                                  	add	si,3			; point to last digit
 40579                                  
 40580                                  	call	VVDigit
 40581                                  	jne	short vvexit
 40582                                  	call	VVDigit
 40583                                  	jne	short vvexit
 40584                                  	cmp	byte [es:si],'.'
 40585                                  	jne	short vvexit
 40586                                  	dec	si
 40587                                  	;call	VVDigit
 40588                                  	; 18/12/2022
 40589                                  	;jmp	short VVDigit
 40590                                  ;vvexit:
 40591                                  	;retn
 40592                                  VVDigit:
 40593                                  	div	bl
 40594                                  	add	ah,'0'
 40595                                  	dec	si
 40596                                  	cmp	[es:si+1],ah
 40597                                  	mov	ah,0			; do not xor or sub we need Z
 40598                                  	retn
 40599                                  
 40600                                  %endif
 40601

 40864                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 40865                                  ;
 40866                                  ; Procedure Name 	: ExePackPatch
 40867                                  ;
 40868                                  ; Inputs	 	: DS 			-> DOSDATA
 40869                                  ;			  ES:0 			-> read in image
 40870                                  ;			  ax:cx = start cs:ip of program
 40871                                  ; Output		:		
 40872                                  ;
 40873                                  ;	1. If ES <= 0fffh
 40874                                  ;	   2. if exepack signature ('RB') found
 40875                                  ;	      3. if common code to patch compares (for 3 diff. versions)
 40876                                  ;	       	 4. if rest of the code & checksum compares
 40877                                  ;	  	    5. overlay buggy code with code in 
 40878                                  ;		       doscode:str1.
 40879                                  ;		 6. endif
 40880                                  ;	      7. endif
 40881                                  ;	   8. endif
 40882                                  ;	9. endif
 40883                                  ;
 40884                                  ;
 40885                                  ; Uses			: NONE
 40886                                  ;
 40887                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------

 40889                                  	; 04/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 MSDOS.SYS)

 40893 00007643 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; bx has load segment

 40895 00007649 7602                    	jbe	short ep_cont		; N:

 41097 0000772E F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb	       
 41098                                  
 41099                                  					; M046 - start
 41100                                  	; a fourth possible version of these exepacked programs have a 
 41101                                  	; 056h instead of 06Bh. See scan_com above
 41102                                  	;
 41103                                  	; 	db  75h, 6Bh		;jne CorruptExe		
 41104                                  	;

 41111 00007737 7502                    	jnz	short ccs_done

 41114                                  ccs_done:				; M046 - end
